title: The Tasmanian tiger
creator_credit: Don Anderson, Linda Taylor and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: Two tourists in search of Tasmania’s Thylacine or marsupial tiger, now probably extinct, see most of the island’s native animals in a zoo. Contains rare archival footage of a Tasmanian tiger in captivity and extensive footage of the Tasmanian devil.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Anderson, Linda Taylor and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
